data.author: Eve Ottenberg
data.title: Bernie on the Budget Committee
data.description: Those discouraged that Bernie Sanders was not appointed labor secretary can take solace in his role as chair of the senate budget committee. There he can accomplish far more for working people than he ever could at the labor department.
